statements: SELECT * FROM CommunicationsLog WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT communication_id, communication_type, communication_date FROM CommunicationsLog WHERE communication_type = 'Email';
SELECT customer_id, communication_date, communication_details FROM CommunicationsLog ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CommunicationsLog WHERE communication_type IN ('Phone Call', 'Meeting');
SELECT communication_id, customer_id, communication_date, communication_type FROM CommunicationsLog WHERE communication_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM CommunicationsLog WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY communication_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT communication_id, customer_id, communication_date FROM CommunicationsLog WHERE communication_type = 'Email' ORDER BY customer_id, communication_date;

SELECT customer_id, communication_type, COUNT(*) AS total_communications FROM CommunicationsLog GROUP BY customer_id, communication_type HAVING total_communications > 3 ORDER BY customer_id, total_communications DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT communication_type FROM CommunicationsLog;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(communication_date) AS latest_communication_date FROM CommunicationsLog GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY latest_communication_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDetails WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerDetails WHERE loan_amount > 5000.00;
SELECT communication_type, communication_content FROM CommunicationsLog WHERE communication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CustomerDetails ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, loan_amount FROM CustomerDetails WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerDetails WHERE loan_amount > 10000 ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT * FROM CommunicationsLog WHERE communication_type = 'Email' AND communication_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY communication_date ASC
SELECT customer_name, loan_amount FROM CustomerDetails WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' OR customer_name LIKE 'B%'

SELECT customer_name, customer_email, loan_amount FROM CustomerDetails INNER JOIN CommunicationsLog ON CustomerDetails.customer_id = CommunicationsLog.customer_id WHERE communication_date > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY communication_date DESC, loan_amount ASC
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, loan_amount FROM CustomerDetails WHERE loan_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 20000 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC,customer_name ASC
SELECT * FROM CommunicationsLog;
SELECT customer_name, communication_date FROM CommunicationsLog;
SELECT communication_id, customer_name, communication_type FROM CommunicationsLog WHERE communication_type = 'Email';
SELECT * FROM CommunicationsLog ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CommunicationsLog WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY communication_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CommunicationsLog WHERE communication_type = 'Email' ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, communication_date, communication_type FROM CommunicationsLog WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT communication_id, customer_name, communication_date FROM CommunicationsLog WHERE communication_type IN ('Phone', 'Fax') ORDER BY customer_name, communication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CommunicationsLog WHERE communication_type = 'Letter' AND message LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY communication_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, communication_type FROM CommunicationsLog WHERE communication_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY customer_name, communication_type DESC;
SELECT communication_id, communication_date, communication_type FROM CommunicationsLog;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerDetails ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT loan_amount, loan_status, customer_id FROM LoanDetails WHERE loan_status = 'Approved';
SELECT employee_name, employee_email, employee_role FROM EmployeeDetails WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM CommunicationsLog JOIN CustomerDetails ON CommunicationsLog.customer_id = CustomerDetails.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM CommunicationsLog WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT communication_id, communication_date, communication_type FROM CommunicationsLog WHERE communication_type = 'Email' ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM CustomerDetails WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM LoanDetails WHERE loan_status = 'Approved' AND loan_amount > 100000 ORDER BY loan_approval_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM EmployeeDetails WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM CommunicationsLog;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT loan_amount, loan_status FROM Loans WHERE loan_status = 'approved';
SELECT employee_name, employee_role, employee_department FROM Employees LIMIT 3;
SELECT loan_id, customer_id, loan_amount, loan_status FROM Loans ORDER BY customer_id DESC, loan_amount ASC;

SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM Employees WHERE employee_department = 'Finance'

SELECT communication_text FROM CommunicationsLog WHERE customer_id = 12345
